item.title: Draft and deploy - Azure Firewall policy changes [Preview]
item.description: In today’s cloud-centric digital landscape, maintaining secure and scalable network infrastructure is essential for enterprises navigating dynamic workloads and compliance demands. Azure Firewall, Microsoft’s fully managed, cloud-native service, offers robust security capabilities including stateful packet inspection, advanced threat prevention, autoscaling, and centralized policy enforcement across distributed Azure environments.
